info.description: API to identify and retrieve the eligible product details, based on the interest of the customer
info.title: Eligible Products for the Customer

get.summary: Retrieves the eligible product details for a customer
get.description: Retrieves the list of customer eligible products generated by the Propensity Engine to identify products which are likely to be of interest to specific customers.

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: Identifier of the customer

parameters.name: productLineId
parameters.description: The top level product line, which the product is ultimately attached to. May be a Temenos-defined product line such as ACCOUNTS, AGENT, BUNDLE, CONSENT, DEPOSITS, LENDING, REWARDS, etc. or one defined by the institution to manage external products.

parameters.name: productGroupId
parameters.description: The group, as defined by the institution, that the product belongs to.

parameters.name: eligibilityFilter
parameters.description: Indicates the filter based on the Eligibility options available to the customer

parameters.name: multiBookEligible
parameters.description: Flag which indicates whether multi booking is applicable or not

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: Contains the unique identifier of the product, e.g. the product id of the arrangement account.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from Transact on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: credentials
parameters.description: Username and password to authenticate the API against core-banking.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: Identifier of the lead company of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch for the respective contract for customer data protection purposes. Example US0010001.

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: Identifies the device type

parameters.name: userRole
parameters.description: User who initiated the transaction

parameters.name: disablePagination
parameters.description: Indicates the pagination header attributes availability. If set to 'true', it fetches all the data

get.summary: Retrieves the periodic interest rate details for specific id

parameters.name: periodicInterestId
parameters.description: Contains the id of the rate of interest assessed on a loan or investment over a set time period when compounding occurs more than once per year

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from Transact on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: credentials
parameters.description: Username and password to authenticate the API against core-banking.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: Identifier of the lead company of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch for the respective contract for customer data protection purposes. Example US0010001.

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: Identifies the device type

parameters.name: userRole
parameters.description: User who initiated the transaction

parameters.name: disablePagination
parameters.description: Indicates the pagination header attributes availability. If set to 'true', it fetches all the data

get.summary: Retrieves the interest details for specific interest catalog

parameters.name: interestCatalogId
parameters.description: Contains the identifier of the catalog for periodic Interest rates

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from Transact on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: credentials
parameters.description: Username and password to authenticate the API against core-banking.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: Identifier of the lead company of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch for the respective contract for customer data protection purposes. Example US0010001.

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: Identifies the device type

parameters.name: userRole
parameters.description: User who initiated the transaction

parameters.name: disablePagination
parameters.description: Indicates the pagination header attributes availability. If set to 'true', it fetches all the data

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by Transact

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

page_size.description: The total number of records per page

page_start.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

total_size.description: The total number of records present

page_token.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from Transact on every enquiry request

currencies.description: Identifies the currency. E.g. USD, GBP etc

currencyId.description: Identifier of the currency. This is the 3-letter ISO 4217 code of the currency.

currencyName.description: The name that is displayed for the currency

minimumTerm.description: Refers to the minimum term associated with the loan process.

maximumTerm.description: Refers to the maximum term associated with the loan process.

productLineId.description: The top level product line, which the product is ultimately attached to. May be a Temenos-defined product line such as ACCOUNTS, AGENT, BUNDLE, CONSENT, DEPOSITS, LENDING, REWARDS, etc. or one defined by the institution to manage external products.

productLineName.description: Description of the product line, e.g. Client Consent for product line CONSENT.

productGroupId.description: The group, as defined by the institution, that the product belongs to.

productId.description: Contains the unique identifier of the product, e.g. the product id of the arrangement account.

productName.description: Product name of the bank for this account, proprietary definition.

availableFromDate.description: The date the product is available in the catalogue for sale to customers

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by Transact

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

code.description: The identifier of the error message
The identifier of the error message

message.description: The actual Transact error message for bad requests

type.description: The identifier of error type: Business

code.description: The identifier of the error message

message.description: The actual Transact error message caused by server

type.description: The identifier of error type: System

term.description: Indicates the period to which the BID and OFFER rates apply

Interest Rate.description: Specifies the interest rate of the product

periodicIndexes.description: Denotes an index which points to the right period of the securities or holdings.

periodicIndex.description: Denotes an index which points to the right period of the securities or holdings.

periodicInterestId.description: Contains the id of the rate of interest assessed on a loan or investment over a set time period when compounding occurs more than once per year
